card.title: Description
card.content:
With this button you can ...
- delete a selected PyMOL scene of the current session.

steps.step: Select a protein from the tree.
Click on :google_material-open_in_new_w200:, to load the pymol session of the selected protein.
Click on a scene in the tree you want to delete.
Click on :google_material-cancel_w200:, to delete the selected scene.
